Package de.aikiit.mailclena

Klasse MailClenaParameterParser

java.lang.Object
de.aikiit.mailclena.MailClenaParameterParser
public final class MailClenaParameterParser extends Object
Extract application configuration from given main()-arguments.

  • Methodendetails

    • extractConfiguration

      Optional<MailConfiguration> extractConfiguration(String... args) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Extracts any given configuration parameters into a @MailConfiguration.
      Parameter:
      args - command-line arguments.
      Gibt zurück:
      complete mail configuration.
      Löst aus:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter cannot be parsed properly.

    • getAvailableOptions

      org.apache.commons.cli.Options getAvailableOptions()
      Convert enumeration elements into command-line options.
      Gibt zurück:
      available parameter options converted as CLI option elements.
